title: Is there a big black bear population in this area?  I saw a black bear near Holly Ridge today.
text:
Here's a link to information about black bears found at the N.c.
Wildlife Resources Commission website. In short, bears are here. for
more details, follow this link:
http://www.ncwildlife.org/Wildlife_Species_Con/Black_Bear/living%20in%20bear%20country.pdf
